full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN GYI BLA'I ZHI RGYAS SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA KHYER BDE BA BYA TSUL DNGOS GRUB BDUD RTZI'I CHAR RGYUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019B (DE LTAR BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN BLA BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD KYI ZHI RGYAS SBYIN SREG 'DI NI, ZHI BA'I SBYIN SREG SPYI'I GZHUNG 'OD SNYE DANG, DE'I DGONGS PA 'GREL BA, RJE BLA MA'I SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO DANG, LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG CHOS LDAN GYI SHEL DKAR ME LONG SOGS LA DANG BSTUN TE SNYOM LAS PA KHU RAL YONGS 'DZIN NOM MONG HAN DPAL LDAN CHOS 'PHEL GYIS SBYAR BA 'DI LA NONGS @020A *, ,PA'I TSOGS MCHIS NA BLA MA LHA DANG BLO LDAN MKHAS PA RNAMS KYI SPYAN NGAR MTHOL SHING BSHAGS SO, ,LEGS PA'I CHA JI SNYED MCHIS PA'I MTHU LA BRTEN NAS BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS KYI SKU TSE BRTAN CING MDZAD 'PHRIN RGYAS PA DANG, DGE 'DUN GYI SDE RNAMS THUGS MTHUN KHRIMS GTZANG ZHING BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I BYA BA RNAMS DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR BYIN GYIS BRLAB TU GSOL,, ,,)` AOm SVASTI, KUN MKHYEN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I CHU GTER LAS, ,BKRA SHIS RBA RLABS DPAL LDAN CHOS 'BYOR KUN, ,'PHEL ZHING 'KHYIL BA'I GNAS NAS RJE BTZUN MA'I, ,GANDHO LA RU MCHOD SBYIN RGYUN 'DI SPEL, ,SARBA SIDDHI MME PRA YATZTSANTU, ,
